pages.title: Blood Grate
pages.text: The blood grate is a block that can collect blood from bleeding carcasses. This block will need to be placed directly below the hanging carcass.

The blood grate can be changed to support blood from other mods. To do this you will need to craft the $(l:butchery:items/butchers_papers)Butchers Papers$(), once crafted simply right click the blood grate and it will cycle through the supported mods blood.
